title: Need volunteers for community garden cleanup
description: Our local community garden needs help with weeding, planting new vegetables, and general maintenance. The garden provides fresh produce for local food banks.

title: Math tutors needed for underprivileged students
description: Looking for volunteer tutors to help struggling students with mathematics. Sessions will be held twice a week for 2 hours each.

title: Emergency flood relief volunteers needed
description: Recent flooding has affected many families in the area. We need urgent help distributing food, water, and essential supplies to affected communities.

title: Medical camp volunteers required
description: Our NGO is organizing a free health checkup camp in a rural area. We need volunteers with medical background as well as general helpers.

title: Help needed to distribute meals to homeless
description: Our shelter is looking for volunteers to help prepare and distribute meals to homeless individuals every evening from 6-8pm.

title: Animal shelter needs temporary caretakers
description: Local animal shelter is overwhelmed with recent rescues and needs temporary volunteers to help feed, clean, and care for animals until permanent homes are found.

title: Elderly companionship program
description: Looking for compassionate individuals to visit and spend time with elderly residents at a local nursing home who don't have regular visitors.

title: Beach cleanup initiative
description: Monthly beach cleanup to remove plastic and other waste. Equipment provided, just bring your enthusiasm and sturdy shoes!

title: Food drive for cyclone victims
description: Collecting non-perishable food items and hygiene products for families affected by recent cyclone damage.

title: Literacy program seeks reading volunteers
description: Our literacy program helps adults improve their reading skills. Volunteers needed to work one-on-one with learners for 1-2 hours per week.

title: COVID vaccination camp assistance
description: Local health department needs volunteers to help with registration, crowd management, and post-vaccination observation at upcoming vaccination camp.

title: Temporary housing needed for displaced family
description: Family of four lost their home in a fire and needs temporary accommodation for 2-3 weeks until insurance arranges permanent housing.

title: Stray dog vaccination drive
description: Local veterinary group organizing vaccination drive for stray dogs. Need volunteers to help catch, hold, and release dogs safely.

title: School supply collection for rural schools
description: Collecting notebooks, pens, backpacks and other school supplies for children in rural villages who cannot afford them.

title: Tech volunteers needed to teach computer basics
description: Community center offering free computer skills classes to seniors and job seekers. Need patient volunteers with basic computer knowledge.

title: Tree planting event this weekend
description: Help restore local ecosystem by planting native trees in a recently cleared area. Tools and saplings provided.

title: Meals needed for hospital patients' families
description: Families staying at hospital with critically ill loved ones need meal support. Looking for home-cooked meals or restaurant donations.

title: Wheelchair repair volunteers needed
description: Local disability support group needs volunteers with mechanical skills to help repair and maintain wheelchairs and other mobility devices.

title: Translators needed for refugee assistance
description: Volunteers who speak Bengali and Burmese needed to help translate for refugee families accessing medical and social services.

title: Winter clothing drive for street children
description: Collecting warm clothes, blankets and shoes for children living on the streets as winter approaches.
